Description: Change of use from single family dwelling to a 6 bedroom 6 person house in multiple occupation (HMO) (PROPOSED). (LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE).
Conversion of two self-contained flats into a single dwelling house (Lawful Development Certificate for a Proposed Development)
Amalgamation of ground and lower ground floor flats to form a single residential unit
Application for a Lawful Development Certificate for a Proposed change of use from A1 to a mix use of A1 and one flat.
Application for a certificate of lawfulness for a proposed development: Use of dwellinghouse as residential care home for no more than 6 young people living together as a single household (C3).
Change of use of first and second floors from Residential (Class C3) to a 5-bed HMO (Class C4).
